attributes.additional_details: Mental illness is a different story, they need help rather than killed but if they are sentenced properly they will be helped for life rather than taken from life.
attributes.background: Why waste money feeding and keeping murders and rapist alive? Yes theirs negatives and positives to death sentence, but more positives!! Negatives includes, false convictions or mental illness but surly if people do their jobs right victims will get the justice they deserve!
